price: ߡߍ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߘߏ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߊ߲߬ߠߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߠߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
